title: Tender for the Supply of Sodium Chloride Intravenous Infusion BP 0.9% W/V, 500 ml bottle (4,800,000 Bottles) MSD/P/027/11 - DHS/(C)P/712/2011 SR NO. 040513
decision_details: - Cabinet approval was granted to award the above procurement to the lowest responsive bidder M/s. Nirma Ltd., India,  at a total C&F price of US $1,536,000.00 ((LKR 173,091,379.20).
